entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:50 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 7:50 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
